exercises.name: Jogging in Place
exercises.description: Let's start easy. We will jog lightly in place. Maintain the pace for 1 min.

exercises.name: Arm Circles
exercises.description: Now let's do some arm circles.First amke sure to be standing apart.We shall do arm circles forward for 30 seconds then backward circles for 30 seconds.

exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.description: Now let's build some upper strength.We shall do this for 1 min.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Now let's build some lower body strength.We shall do this for 1 min.
